#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=THE JAIL-BREAKERS
#Text=For a long time it had been arranged they all should go to the Harvard and Yale game in Winthrop 's car .
#Text=It was perfectly well understood .
#Text=Even Peabody , who pictured himself and Miss Forbes in the back of the car , with her brother and Winthrop in front , condescended to approve .
#Text=It was necessary to invite Peabody because it was his great good fortune to be engaged to Miss Forbes .

#Text=Her brother Sam had been invited , not only because he could act as chaperon for his sister , but because since they were at St. Paul 's , Winthrop and he , either as participants or spectators , had never missed going together to the Yale-Harvard game .
#Text=And Beatrice Forbes herself had been invited because she was herself .
#Text=When at nine o'clock on the morning of the game , Winthrop stopped the car in front of her door , he was in love with all the world .
#Text=In the November air there was a sting like frost-bitten cider , in the sky there was a brilliant , beautiful sun , in the wind was the tingling touch of three ice-chilled rivers .

#Text=And in the big house facing Central Park , outside of which his prancing steed of brass and scarlet chugged and protested and trembled with impatience , was the most wonderful girl in all the world .
#Text=It was true she was engaged to be married , and not to him .
#Text=But she was not yet married .

#Text=And to-day it would be his privilege to carry her through the State of New York and the State of Connecticut , and he would snatch glimpses of her profile rising from the rough fur collar , of her wind-blown hair , of the long , lovely lashes under the gray veil .
#Text=" ' Shall be together , breathe and ride , so , one day more am I deified ; ' " whispered the young man in the Scarlet Car ; " ' who knows but the world may end to-night ? '

_	_	_	_

column1: #Text=" Mr. Winthrop and Sam planned this trip for us a long time ago -- to give us a little pleasure -- -- "
